title: LayerNorm and RMS Norm in Transformer Models
content: This post is divided into five parts; they are: • Why Normalization is Needed in Transformers • LayerNorm and Its Implementation • Adaptive LayerNorm • RMS Norm and Its Implementation • Using PyTorch's Built-in Normalization Normalization layers improve model quality in deep learning.
author: Adrian Tam
